languages.text: "Послушай, Дэгген. Я тебя терпеть не могу, ты меня терпеть не можешь. Но, может быть, отложим в сторону наши разногласия? Ради общей, так сказать, цели", {n}— мужчина кивает на вас и недобро прищуривается.{/n}
"Listen, Daggen. I hate you, you hate me. But maybe we can set aside our differences? For the sake of our mutual... target, so to speak." {n}The man nods at you and narrows his eyes ominously.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Послушай, Дэгген. Я тебя терпеть не могу, ты меня терпеть не можешь. Но, может быть, отложим в сторону наши разногласия? Ради общей, так сказать, цели", {n}— мужчина кивает на вас и недобро прищуривается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Listen, Daggen. I hate you, you hate me. But maybe we can put aside our differences? For the sake of our mutual... target, so to speak." {n}The man nods at you and narrows his eyes ominously.{/n}
"Listen, Daggen. I hate you, you hate me. But maybe we can put aside our differences? For the sake of our mutual... target, so to speak." {n}The man nods at you and narrows his eyes ominously.{/n}

"Listen, Daggen. I hate you, you hate me. But maybe we can set aside our differences? For the sake of our mutual... target, so to speak." {n}The man nods at you and narrows his eyes ominously.{/n}
"Listen, Daggen. I hate you, you hate me. But maybe we can set aside our differences? For the sake of our mutual... target, so to speak." {n}The man nods at you and narrows his eyes ominously.{/n}

languages.text: “听着，达根。我恨你，你也恨我，但或许我们可以暂时放下我们之间的分歧？为了我们共同的……目标，就这么说吧。”{n}男人对你点了点头，阴险地眯起了眼睛。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Listen, Daggen. I hate you, you hate me. But maybe we can set aside our differences? For the sake of our mutual... target, so to speak." {n}The man nods at you and narrows his eyes ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “听着，达根。我恨你，你也恨我，但或许我们可以暂时放下我们之间的分歧？为了我们共同的……目标，就这么说吧。”{n}男人对你点了点头，阴险地眯起了眼睛。{/n}

languages.text: «Mira, Daggen. Yo te odio y tú me odias, pero ¿podemos aparcar nuestras diferencias? Por el bien de nuestro... objetivo común, por así decirlo». {n}El hombre hace un gesto con la cabeza hacia ti y entrecierra los ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Listen, Daggen. I hate you, you hate me. But maybe we can set aside our differences? For the sake of our mutual... target, so to speak." {n}The man nods at you and narrows his eyes ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mira, Daggen. Yo te odio y tú me odias, pero ¿podemos aparcar nuestras diferencias? Por el bien de nuestro... objetivo común, por así decirlo». {n}El hombre hace un gesto con la cabeza hacia ti y entrecierra los ojos.{/n}

languages.text: 「おい、ダゲン。俺らはお互いが大嫌いだが…今だけ和解しないか？共通の…『獲物』のために」{n}男はこちらを見てうなずき、不気味に目を細めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Listen, Daggen. I hate you, you hate me. But maybe we can set aside our differences? For the sake of our mutual... target, so to speak." {n}The man nods at you and narrows his eyes ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「おい、ダゲン。俺らはお互いが大嫌いだが…今だけ和解しないか？共通の…『獲物』のために」{n}男はこちらを見てうなずき、不気味に目を細めた。{/n}

languages.text: "Hört mal, Daggen. Ich hasse Euch, Ihr hasst mich. Aber vielleicht können wir unsere Differenzen vertagen? Zugunsten unseres gemeinsamen ... Ziels, sozusagen." {n}Der Mann nickt in deine Richtung und kneift bedrohlich die Augen zusammen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Listen, Daggen. I hate you, you hate me. But maybe we can set aside our differences? For the sake of our mutual... target, so to speak." {n}The man nods at you and narrows his eyes ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hört mal, Daggen. Ich hasse Euch, Ihr hasst mich. Aber vielleicht können wir unsere Differenzen vertagen? Zugunsten unseres gemeinsamen ... Ziels, sozusagen." {n}Der Mann nickt in deine Richtung und kneift bedrohlich die Augen zusammen.{/n}

languages.text: « Écoute, Daggen. Je te déteste et tu me détestes, c'est un fait. Mais on pourrait peut-être mettre nos différends de côté le temps de nous occuper de notre... cible commune, dira-t-on. » {n}Il fait un signe de tête dans votre direction tout en plissant les yeux pour se donner un air menaçant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Listen, Daggen. I hate you, you hate me. But maybe we can set aside our differences? For the sake of our mutual... target, so to speak." {n}The man nods at you and narrows his eyes ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Écoute, Daggen. Je te déteste et tu me détestes, c'est un fait. Mais on pourrait peut-être mettre nos différends de côté le temps de nous occuper de notre... cible commune, dira-t-on. » {n}Il fait un signe de tête dans votre direction tout en plissant les yeux pour se donner un air menaçant.{/n}

languages.text: "Dinle Daggen. Birbirimizden nefret ediyoruz fakat belki husumetimizi bir kenara bırakabiliriz. Ortak hedefimiz için yani." {n}Adam başıyla seni işaret edip gözlerini uğursuzca kısıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Listen, Daggen. I hate you, you hate me. But maybe we can set aside our differences? For the sake of our mutual... target, so to speak." {n}The man nods at you and narrows his eyes ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dinle Daggen. Birbirimizden nefret ediyoruz. Fakat belki farklılıklarımızı bir kenara koyabiliriz. Ortak hedefimiz için yani." {n}Adam başını sallıyor ve gözlerini uğursuz bir şekilde kısıyor.{/n}
